name: CreateOAuth2PermissionGrant
description: Create oAuth2PermissionGrant (a delegated permission grant). Create a delegated permission grant represented by an oAuth2PermissionGrant object. A delegated permission grant authorizes a client service principal (representing a client application) to access a resource service principal (representing an API), on behalf of a signed-in user, for the level of access limited by the delegated permissions which were granted.
